descriptionHTML:
Wear Charging Screen is the app for Android Wear watches that launches automatically when you charge your watch. Charging widget provides the useful information such as: big night clock, date, battery status and easy-to-use flashlight.

FEATURES:

★ 5 Color Themes
★ Auto screen rotate
★ Built-in Wear Flashlight
★ 12/24 time auto-format
★ Date and Day information
★ Watch Battery indicator
★ High Resolution Design
★ Support for Round and Square watches

INSTRUCTION:

1. Install Wear Charging Screen app 
2. Wait a minute 
3. Run it the on you watch*
 5. Enjoy!

*You have to open the app at least once on your watch after installing for it to work

USEFUL SKILLS:

- Touch the screen to turn ON the wear flash light
- Long press on screen to exit the screensaver

The Wear Charging Screen app has been tested on Moto® 360, LG® G Watch R, ASUS® ZenWatch, Sony® SmartWatch and other. Any problems? Please email me and I'll try my best to fix any issues you have!
